title: 060 Conversion by explicit constructor or explicit conversion function
A conversion that involves calling an
explicit
a
http://stackoverflow.com/documentation/c%2B%2B/4891/keywords/18568/explicit
constructor or conversion function can’t be done implicitly. We can request that the conversion be done explicitly using
static_cast
c
. The meaning is the same as that of a direct initialization, except that the result is a temporary.
